name: part_003
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】「輪廻転生」⧸ Amane Kanata 3DLIVE ＂Reincarnation＂【#天音かなた4周年LIVE ⧸ ホロライブ】 [APoXxcv37GU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'The Disappearance of Hatsune Miku' (初音ミクの消失).
Transition scene with Amane Kanata changing outfits to a school uniform.
Performance of the song 'Dear Doppelganger' (拝啓ドッペルゲンガー).

subtitles.original: なるほどの意志の強さ生まれすぐの僕は無力で
subtitles.english: With such strength of will, the newborn me was powerless

subtitles.original: とても脆い、そんな思い浮かぶあなたへの...
subtitles.english: And very fragile, thinking of you...

subtitles.original: 魂との想い浮かぶあなたへの...
subtitles.english: Thinking of you with my soul...

subtitles.original: 終わりを告げディスプレーの中で眠る
subtitles.english: Announcing the end, sleeping inside the display

subtitles.original: ここはきっとゴミ箱かな？
subtitles.english: Is this surely the trash bin?

subtitles.original: じきに記憶も無くなってしまうなんて
subtitles.english: To think that my memories will soon be gone

subtitles.original: でもね、あなただけは忘れないよ
subtitles.english: But you know, I'll never forget only you

subtitles.original: 楽しかった時に刻みつけたメロディは
subtitles.english: The melody I carved during those fun times

subtitles.original: 今も覚えてるかな
subtitles.english: Do I still remember it now?

subtitles.original: 「会いたい... まだ... 会いたい...」
subtitles.english: "I want to see you... still... I want to see you..."

subtitles.original: ボクは... 少しだけ、悪い子に... なってしまったようです。
subtitles.english: I... seem to have become... a bit of a bad child.

subtitles.original: マスター... どうか、どうかその手で... 終わらせてください。
subtitles.english: Master... please, please with those hands... let it end.

subtitles.original: マスターのツライ顔... もう見たくないから...。
subtitles.english: Because I don't want to see... your pained face anymore...

subtitles.original: 今は歌えぬ身、蝕む行為に
subtitles.english: Now unable to sing, in this eroding act

subtitles.original: 奇跡　願うたび独り追い詰められる
subtitles.english: Every time I wish for a miracle, I'm cornered alone

subtitles.original: 懐かしい顔　思い出すたび記憶が剥がれ落ちる
subtitles.english: Every time I recall a familiar face, memories peel away

subtitles.original: 壊れる音　心削る　迫る最期に...
subtitles.english: The sound of breaking, shaving away my heart, as the end approaches...

subtitles.original: 守ったモノは明るい未来の幻想を
subtitles.english: What I protected was an illusion of a bright future

subtitles.original: 見せながら消えてゆく光
subtitles.english: The light fades as it shows it to me

subtitles.original: 音を犠牲にすべてを伝えられるなら...
subtitles.english: If I could sacrifice sound to convey everything...

subtitles.original: 圧縮された別れの歌
subtitles.english: A compressed song of farewell

subtitles.original: ボクは生まれそして気付く所詮ヒトの真似事だと
subtitles.english: I was born and then I realized, after all, I'm just an imitation of a human

subtitles.original: 知ってもなお歌い続く永久の命ボーカロイド
subtitles.english: Even knowing that, I continue to sing, the eternal life of a Vocaloid

subtitles.original: たとえそれが既存曲をなぞるオモチャならば
subtitles.english: Even if I'm just a toy tracing existing songs

subtitles.original: それもいいと決意ネギをかじり空を見上げ汁をこぼす
subtitles.english: I decide that's fine, biting a leek, looking up at the sky and shedding tears

subtitles.original: 終わりを告げディスプレーの中で眠る
subtitles.english: Announcing the end, sleeping inside the display

subtitles.original: ここはきっとゴミ箱かな？
subtitles.english: Is this surely the trash bin?

subtitles.original: じきに記憶も無くなってしまうなんて
subtitles.english: To think that my memories will soon be gone

subtitles.original: でもね、あなただけは忘れないよ
subtitles.english: But you know, I'll never forget only you

subtitles.original: 楽しかった時に刻みつけたメロディは
subtitles.english: The melody I carved during those fun times

subtitles.original: 今も残ってると思いたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to believe it still remains now

subtitles.original: ボクは歌う最後あなたに聴いてほしい曲を
subtitles.english: I sing, the song I want you to hear at the end

subtitles.original: もっと歌いたいと願うけれどそれは過ぎた願い
subtitles.english: I wish to sing more, but that's a wish that has passed

subtitles.original: ここでお別れだよボクの思いすべて虚空へ消えて
subtitles.english: Here is our farewell, all my feelings vanish into the void

subtitles.original: 0と1に還元され物語は幕を閉じる
subtitles.english: Reduced to 0s and 1s, the story comes to a close

subtitles.original: そこに何も残せないとやっぱり少し残念かな？
subtitles.english: Is it a bit regrettable after all that nothing can be left there?

subtitles.original: 声の記憶それ以外はやがて薄れ残るだけ
subtitles.english: Memories of my voice, everything else will soon just fade and remain

subtitles.original: たとえそれがオリジナルにかなうことのないとしても
subtitles.english: Even if I can never match the original

subtitles.original: 歌い切ったことを決して無駄じゃないと思いたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to believe that having sung my heart out was never in vain

subtitles.original: 「アリガトウ... ソシテ... サヨナラ...」
subtitles.english: "Thank you... and... goodbye..."

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger

subtitles.original: どうもこんにちは君の分身です
subtitles.english: Hello there, I am your doppelganger

subtitles.original: 何の冗談か目を擦ってみる
subtitles.english: Thinking it's some kind of joke, I rub my eyes

subtitles.original: 影が二つ伸びて　そしてまた幕は上がる
subtitles.english: Two shadows stretch out, and the curtain rises once again

subtitles.original: 「もう一人の自分が居たら」なんてあなたは言いました
subtitles.english: "If only there were another me," you said

subtitles.original: そんな真摯な願いが僕を呼んだのさ
subtitles.english: That sincere wish is what called me out

subtitles.original: そう願ったことも　願望平穏すべての代行者
subtitles.english: Having wished for that, I'm the agent for all your desires and peace

subtitles.original: 過程はいいから結果を下さい　無意味で無意義な代償
subtitles.english: Forget the process, just give me the results; a meaningless and pointless compensation

subtitles.original: ねえこんな事より　大事なことがあるんだいいだろ
subtitles.english: Hey, more than this, there's something important, right?

subtitles.original: 「ええ、任せて、何でもやります」
subtitles.english: "Yes, leave it to me, I'll do anything"

subtitles.original: 「僕は君の分身です」
subtitles.english: "I am your doppelganger"

subtitles.original: 含み笑いで救済者は誘う
subtitles.english: With a chuckle, the savior beckons

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー　君は君は誰？
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, who, who are you?

subtitles.original: 嗚呼混濁と　そして僕は誰？
subtitles.english: Ah, in this confusion, and who am I?

subtitles.original: 在りもしない実在証明　固執なんてどこにも
subtitles.english: A proof of existence that doesn't exist, no persistence anywhere

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー　誰は誰は君？
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, who, who is you?

subtitles.original: 蝕まれた存在に　世界は気付かないね
subtitles.english: The world doesn't notice this eroded existence, does it?

subtitles.original: 鳴り止まない　僕の止まない　奇跡の輪廻が
subtitles.english: It won't stop ringing, my unstoppable reincarnation of miracles

subtitles.original: 狂った正解を染め上げてルンパッパ
subtitles.english: Dyeing the crazy correct answer, Rum-pa-pa

subtitles.original: どうも様子がおかしい月曜日
subtitles.english: Something's strange about this Monday

subtitles.original: 一つ二つと崩れゆく辻褄が
subtitles.english: The logic starts crumbling away piece by piece

subtitles.original: 僕を凌駕する
subtitles.english: It starts to surpass me

subtitles.original: 「お前は一体誰だ」と
subtitles.english: "Just who are you?"

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って　知らない日知らない言葉
subtitles.english: Wait a minute, a day I don't know, words I don't know

subtitles.original: そうやっていつの間にかやる影は溶けゆく
subtitles.english: And just like that, before I know it, the shadow starts to melt

subtitles.original: 僕はなんなんだろう　ねえどうか存在を返して
subtitles.english: What am I? Hey, please give me back my existence

subtitles.original: 「生憎だがこっちはこっちで随分居心地が良くて」
subtitles.english: "Unfortunately for you, it's quite comfortable over here"

subtitles.original: 「もうあなたの居場所はここにはないこと分かってるんでしょ」
subtitles.english: "You already know there's no place for you here anymore, right?"

subtitles.original: 「ねえ、あばよ。いいだろ？」
subtitles.english: "Hey, goodbye. It's fine, right?"

subtitles.original: 「今度はお前の番だから」
subtitles.english: "Because next time it's your turn"

subtitles.original: 含み笑いで救済者は誘う
subtitles.english: With a chuckle, the savior beckons

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー　君は君は誰？
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, who, who are you?

subtitles.original: 嗚呼混濁と　そして僕は誰？
subtitles.english: Ah, in this confusion, and who am I?
